title: New client wont start or show up
body:
After I updated the client whenever I click launch on the patcher it shows the league of legends loading logo for a sec and then nothing happens.
League of legends does show up on task manager but its nowhere on my screen or anything.
Rebooting pc doesn't help, reinstalled it 3 times and it still doesn't work. 
Idk if this helps but when I click on the LeagueClient application in the league of legends folder it says this "Failed to load URL "https://riot:oC4rbf38pj-NLa1k-5yyvQ@127.0.0.1:58308/index.html" with error "empty response" (-324)."
I hope someone can help cause I never had this problem with the old client.

replies.body: Thanks for the info and error details!  It looks like your network connection is having problems specifically reaching our services.  Run through each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get that loaded up.  If you run into any issues let me know, as well as if you're on a mac or pc.  I'll be around!

Hey link me a 3rd party client/launcher.
id like to actually work with something that works and doesn't give a shitty bad image error after every reinstall.

The dev team really fked this client launch
